results.description:
Welcome at Vierde vrijdag! = The monthly meetup for sharing knowledge, inspiration, (co)working on projects & talks in the afternoon!

PROGRAM
==========

10:00 Be welcome to meet & (co)work, have an informal gathering, create your mini-hackathon..

ALL DAY
-----------

üöÄ PFLAB POPUP

Bring your own tech to share during the day. A new gadget, smart watch, virtual reality app, robot? Share it at this the Permanent Future Lab popup!

Confirmed tech available to try: Homido Mini VR glasses, Trezor Bitcoin Wallet, de Meta2 Developers Kit ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-KIgvc-LVDs ) - What do you bring with you?

For an impression of previous #PFLab events, check the hashtag #PFLab on socials. For more information about Permanent Future Lab, check http://permanentfuturelab.wiki/.

üê± CRYPTOKITTY MARKET PLACE

Do you own a cryptokitty? Bring it, print it, trade it. https://www.cryptokitties.co/

üí∏ WORKSHOP BITCOIN FORKS
----------- 11:00 - 11:45 --------------

There are many forks of Bitcoin these days. If you have Bitcoin, with every fork you'll get 'free money'. But how to redeem it safely?

In this session we will show you how to safely get your new coins after a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.

If you want to practice during the session -> take the the private key of a small wallet with you, and your laptop. Here you can find out if you have coins to redeem: https://btcdiv.com/

‚õì SESSION: CREATING DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS MATRIX
--------------------------- 11:30 - 12:15 --------------------------------

Hi all, in the morning (11am?) Samir and I (Jurjen) want to do a session together with everyone that likes to join about creating a matrix model together of blockchain centralized / decentralized initiatives. To see an example of a matrix created for the sharing economy, see

üçü LUNCH
--- 13:00 ---

Bring your own, visit a bar or have some salad/bread/fries at The Hague Tech for 5 EUR only.

üì¢ ANNOUNCEMENTS
---------- 15:00 -----------

- New Maker Space at The Hague Tech
- BlockRock podcast
- Blockchain Lab in The Hague
- BYOA (Bring your own announcement ;)

ü§ó GET SOCIAL
------- 15:15 -------

GetSocial is one of the startups building a business at The Hague Tech. Jeroen will tell where they came from, what the challenges, struggles & good decissions were & where GetSocial's heading now.

üöÄ CODING WITH ETHEREUM ERC721
--------------------- 15:45 ---------------------

Diederik -computer science student @ TU Delft- will do a Tech-talk about ERC721: a non-fungible token standard. The token standard is a 'draft', but it's already popularised by CryptoKitties.

Join to learn about the ERC721 basics, applications (kitties, art, cards, etc), wallet implementation + bottlenecks & extensions like IPFS storage.

üì∫ DEEP DIVE INTO DECRED
------------------ 16:35 -----------------

"Decred is an autonomous digital currency. The project was created to solve the forking problems of Bitcoin and launched in 2016 without ICO or external funding. Its innovative blockchain empowers stakeholders and allows for the seamless transition from one set of consensus rules to another. Stakeholders who participate in decision-making are rewarded for their efforts. The Decred project is committed to release free and open-source code.

üì£ TAKE THE STAGE
------------------ 17:10 ----------------

Want to show/share/tell a bit about your projects/ideas&knowledge? Your innovative business? A fun project? Please let us know in the comments below!

üçª DRINKS
--- 17:30 ---

PREVIOUS EDITIONS: https://www.meetup.com/vierdevrijdag/events/past/
results.name: Vierde vrijdag! [blockchain, AI] Talks, tech, entrepreneurship in The Hague

results.description:
Welcome to Vierde vrijdag! = The monthly meetup for sharing knowledge, inspiration, (co)working on projects & talks in the afternoon!

PREVIOUS EDITIONS: https://www.meetup.com/vierdevrijdag/events/past/

PROGRAM
==========

10:00 Be welcome to meet & (co)work, have an informal gathering, create your mini-hackathon...

üçü LUNCH
--- 13:00 ---

Bring your own, visit a bar or have some salad/bread/fries at The Hague Tech for 5 EUR only.

üì¢ ANNOUNCEMENTS
---------- 15:00 -----------

- BlockRock: Learnings about setting up a podcast
- Update on #blockbar: The blockchain lab at The Hague Tech
- New Maker Space at The Hague Tech
- Announcement: AI Lab @ The Hague Tech!
- BYOA (Bring your own announcement ;)

# AI DISRUPTION
------- 15:30 -------

AI gaat de wereld veranderen. Zowel op een positieve als negatieve manier. Blijf op de hoogte, dan weet je wat het is en hoe je het op de maximale manier in je voordeel kunt gebruiken.

We gaan praten over de huidige technologie en wat het in de toekomst kan gaan betekenen.

"Wat gaat kunstmatige intelligentie eigenlijk voor jou betekenen?" door Ahmed .

BEST PRACTICES TO OUTSOURCING DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS
------- 15:45 -------

By Eastsource: Software and Outsourcing Consultancy https://www.eastsource.tech/

ü§ó UNCONFERENCE
------- 16:15 -------

üì£ TAKE THE STAGE
------------------ xx.xx ----------------

Want to show/share/tell a bit about your projects/ideas&knowledge? Your innovative business? A fun project? Please let us know in the comments below!

üçª DRINKS
--- 17:30 ---

Welcome to Vierde vrijdag! = The monthly meetup for sharing knowledge, inspiration, (co)working on projects & talks in the afternoon!

PREVIOUS EDITIONS: https://www.meetup.com/vierdevrijdag/events/past/

PROGRAM
==========

10:00 üçµ Be welcome to meet & (co)work, have an informal gathering, create your mini-hackathon..

13:00 üçü LUNCH

Bring your own, visit a bar or have some salad/bread/fries at The Hague Tech for 5 EUR only.

15:00 üì¢ ANNOUNCEMENTS

* Blockbar will announce a new workshop (block March 30th in your agenda)
* The https://ethcc.io Ethereum conference was in Paris this month. Any attendees that want to share their experience?
* In March we've seen the Dutch Groningen hackathon as well. Which hackers can share info about the prototype they made?
* Your announcement: What are you working on? What cool stuff did you see or learn last month?

15:15 üì£ NICOLAB

Waffi, senior architect of Tymlez, will update us on the proceedings of NicoLab. A blockchain audit trail for brain seizure diagnoses & events.

15:30 üì£ THE POWER OF COMMITMENT

Timo Lamboo will take the stage to tell us about Recharging your company and the power of commitment.

16:00 üì£ AI DEVELOPMENTS monthly overview by Ahmed

16:15 üì£ BLOCKCHAIN NEWS

16:30 üì£ HOT POTATOES Charles will tell us more about this new trend in the crypto world

16:45 üì£ TAKE THE STAGE!

Want to show/share/tell a bit about your projects/ideas&knowledge? Your innovative business? A fun project? Please let us know in the comments below!

17:30 üçª DRINKS

Together with the The Hague Tech Monthly Open Meetup https://www.meetup.com/the-hague-tech-monthly-drinks/.

results.description:
We will have another Vierde vrijdag this month! Summer edition.

Vierde vrijdag is a day for coworking, networking, sharing ideas & showing projects.

Starting at 10 there's coffee, a good time to meet everyone. Feel free to work in projects, chat with each other, get feedback.

From 3.30pm there're presentations / it's possible to present your project. If you have something you'd like to show, mention it in the comments!

This Vierde vrijdag takes place at The Hague Tech, the tech hub just behind The Hague Central Station. It's possible to lunch here for only 5 EUR, +- 1pm.

You can reach The Hague Tech easily by bike, train, metro, bus, and tram. (If you are by car, there is paid street parking in the area till 14:00.)

RSVP & keep updated of confirmed talks.

PROGRAM
==========

‚òï COFFEE
10:00 Be welcome to meet & (co)work, have an informal gathering, create your mini-hackathon...

üçü LUNCH
13:00 Bring your own, visit a bar or have some salad/bread/fries at The Hague Tech for 5 EUR only.

üì¢ TALKS/SESSIONS
15:30 Announcements & start of program.

--15:45-- Google Design Sprints: how do they work?

Jeroen Walta & Thomas Platzer recently hosted a very interesting Google Design Sprint right here in THT. Learn all about the process from one of the sprintmasters himself.

The design sprint session is followed by a show & tell of the result of last design sprint, by @Diesmaster.

--16:20-- Permanent Future Lab to The Hague?

@bartwr will share the concept of Permanent Future Lab and do a brainstorm: Would The Hague Tech be a good location for #PFLab in The Hague? https://permanentfuturelab.wiki/

--16:45-- The latest AI developments in the July AI Update

Get the latest updates on AI developments, by Ahmed Rbaibi. In just 20 minutes he will show you the most exciting AI moments of this month.

--17:15-- Introducing Telos. The fast, scalable & fair EOS alternative

Keten.io, the team behind DutchEOS, will present their optimised EOS alternative called Telos. Jan Smit & Joost Voordouw can tell you all on how to get started on Telos & why that is a good idea. https://www.telosfoundation.io

üì£ TAKE THE STAGE
Want to show/share/tell a bit about your projects/ideas&knowledge? Your innovative business? A fun project? Please let us know in the comments below!

üçª DRINKS
+- 17:00 Get to know the people even more, start new projects together, drink on failures and success. Drinks can be payed in both crypto, cash & e-EUR.

--

Vierde vrijdag is a monthly recurring meetup. See https://www.meetup.com/vierdevrijdag/events/past/ and https://twitter.com/search?q=%23vierdevrijdag to get an impression of previous events.

Fill in this form if you want to share a talk/workshop/learning during this Vierde vrijdag -> https://goo.gl/forms/Udk0A6zxZbFgKAqn1

Don't miss this.
results.how_to_find_us: Find "The Hague Tech" on Maps, ring the bell for "Blockbar" and go to the 3rd floor. Then left.
results.name: Vierde vrijdag! Sharing knowledge + tech + projects + business + learnings

results.description:
Vierde vrijdag is a day for coworking, networking, sharing ideas & showing projects. In the afternoon there're talks for and by the community.

WHAT TO EXPECT
=================

Starting at 10:30 there's coffee, a good time to meet everyone. Feel free to work on projects, chat with each other, get feedback.

From 3:30pm there're presentations & it's possible to present your project.

This Vierde vrijdag takes place at The Hague Tech, the tech hub just behind The Hague Central Station. It's possible to lunch here for only 5 EUR, +- 1pm.

HOW TO GET THERE
===================

You can reach The Hague Tech easily by bike, train, metro, bus, and tram. (If you are by car, there is paid street parking in the area till 14:00.)

For a walking route from Central Station to The Hague Tech, see the last image in de 'images carousel' of this page.

PROGRAM
==========

‚òï COFFEE
10:00 Be welcome to meet & (co)work, have an informal gathering, create your mini-hackathon..

üçü LUNCH
12:30 Bring your own, visit a bar or have some salad/bread/fries at The Hague Tech for only 5 EUR.

üì¢ TALKS/SESSIONS (parallel)

15:30 Start of program: Do you have something to share?

üî∏ 3 Minute Shoutouts: Share your session topic / thoughts / project / request in less than 3 minutes.

15:45 Studiate - A company introduction by Andrew Wright

Studiate is a platform designed to help music teachers and other independent teachers (√°nd member at The Hague Tech). It automates workflow for administration (scheduling, invoicing, payments, bookkeeping, taxes) saving both time and money.

In this session Andrew gives a short introduction on Studiate, shows an impression of the platform as well as a forecast of where Studiate is heading. After the short 5 minute talk there's time for Q&A.

16:00 Exciting times in blockchain world

These days a lot is happening in blockchain space. New chains, consensus mechanisms, scalability techniques, and most of all: crypto starts to be integrated in apps! In this session you'll get a broad overview of the blockchain developments in the latest few weeks.

16:45 Daan Meily shares its research on succesful coworking spaces

How can coworking spaces and start-ups benefit from more collaboration and grow sustainably: After spending several months on researching coworking spaces and using The Hague Tech as a case study, Daan Meily is now eager to share his results. His research was focussed on collaboration and in his pitch he hopes to explain to you a bit better why this is so important.

17:15 Profit first! A session on the theme 'money management'

Bart R just learned about a technique to save and accumulate money, called 'Profit First'. The concept is simple: Always take profit first, then pay your bills. If you can't pay your bills you're overspending. The goal of this session is to exchange ideas on how to manage and accumulate money. What techniques do you use, what works well, what doesn't? Join to share some experiences on this together.

üçª DRINKS

+- 17:45 Get to know the people even more, start new projects together, drink on failures and success. Drinks can be payed in both crypto, cash & e-EUR.

--

Vierde vrijdag is a monthly recurring meetup. See https://www.meetup.com/vierdevrijdag/events/past/ and https://twitter.com/search?q=%23vierdevrijdag to get an impression of previous events.
results.how_to_find_us: Find "The Hague Tech" on Maps, ring the bell for "Blockbar" and go to the 3rd floor. Then left.
results.name: Vierde vrijdag! Sharing knowledge + tech + learnings + business + projects

results.description:
An exciting new Vierde vrijdag this month, featuring virtual reality demos, blockchain talks & info on the development of a new content creators platform. September 28th!

Vierde vrijdag is a day for coworking, networking, sharing ideas & showing projects. In the afternoon there're talks for and by the community.

WHAT TO EXPECT
=================

Starting at 10:00 there's coffee, a good time to meet everyone. Feel free to work on projects, chat with each other, get feedback. From 2pm there're presentations & it's possible to present your project.

This Vierde vrijdag takes place at The Hague Tech, the tech hub just behind The Hague Central Station.

HOW TO GET THERE
===================

You can reach The Hague Tech easily by bike, train, metro, bus, and tram. (If you are by car, there is paid street parking in the area till 14:00.)

For a walking route from Central Station to The Hague Tech, see the last image in de 'images carousel' of this page.

PROGRAM
==========

‚òï COFFEE
10:00 Be welcome to meet & (co)work, have an informal gathering, create your mini-hackathon..

üçü LUNCH
12:30 Have salad/bread/fries at The Hague Tech for only 5 EUR, or bring your own.

üì¢ TALKS/SESSIONS (parallel)

‚òÖ 14:00 Introduction & 2-minute announcements

Have something to share, ask or announce to the community? Do it now! You have three minutes to share what you want to share.

In this intro you'll get to know the cool projects from in and outside the community in no time.

‚òÖ 14:15 - 14:45 The Content Blockchain project

The Content Blockchain Project https://content-blockchain.org is an open initiative to support the creation of a dedicated blockchain network designed for the media ecosystem.

The network will simplify digital content identification, license management, content distribution and the monetization of digital content. It is open and can be used by anyone to create innovative applications, enabling new business models on a decentralized network.

The session by Sebastian Posth will introduce the Content Blockchain, the ISCC digital standard identifier http://iscc.codes/ and present the roadmap for the launch of the network.

‚òÖ 15:00 - 15:30 Mining cryptocurrencies: This is how it works

Mick (CryptoPepes) will give you a mining demo. You'll learn about Proof of Work & blockchain consensus mechanisms. The people in the audience function as block producers. Join this interactive, informative session to learn about the way blockchain works.

‚òÖ 15:45 - 16:15 The state of Virtual Reality by DutchVR

DutchVR http://dutchvr.com/ is a well known The Hague based company specialized in creating VR and AR applications. In this session by Duncan Smit you'll see one of the newer demos. During the day it's possible to experience VR / AR yourself!

‚òÖ 16:15 - 16:45 Blockchain Monthly Update

Blockchain Monthly Update / What happened in blockchain this month? The Blockbar community shares the latest news, current crypto projects & insights on blockchain space.

Program to be finalized. Leave a message if you want a time slot for your topic.

üçª DRINKS

17:00 Get to know the people even more, start new projects together, drink on failures and success. Drinks can be payed in both crypto, cash & e-EUR.

--

Vierde vrijdag group chat on Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/A8b03hGYC8RkLnEa4_tGeA
results.how_to_find_us: Find "The Hague Tech" on Maps, ring the bell for "Blockbar" and go to the 3rd floor. Then left.
results.name: Vierde vrijdag! September 2018

results.description:
Vierde vrijdag | October 2018 | Talks, networking, sharing knowledge | Line up: OEHU energy project using decentralized storage, Intelectual Property, data storage, blockchain technology, drinks üç∏

For the first time we'll start the talks at 5pm and end with drinks +- 8pm. This way you can work on your projects in daytime and celebrate the end of the week √°nd month with people+talks+drinks afterwards. Curious what you think of this schedule, let us know at the meetup!

üéâ LINE UP

(You're welcome at The Hague Tech from 10, if you want to work on own projects and/or meet the community at The Hague Tech. The talks start at 17:00h)

‚òÖ 14:30 Blockbar deepdive: Pirate Chain, the most private blockchain

Find out about the privacy challenges of Zcash & Monero and how Pirate Chain came to their answer. Is Pirate Chain the next big privacy coin?

An introduction to privacy aspects of blockchains, crypto conditions and Pirate Chain. ARRR!

‚òÖ 17:00 Introduction & 2-minute announcements

Have something to share, ask or announce to the community? Do it now! You have two minutes to share what you want to share.

In this intro you'll get to know the cool projects from in and outside the community in no time.

‚òÖ 17:15 - 17:45 Data storage on the blockchain? / bart roorda

Blockchain for data storage? In this talk you'll learn when to use blockchain (and when not). After this session you know how data is stored in blocks. Next to that you'll get a broad overview of live projects that already work on daily basis with data storage + blockchain in their online platforms.

‚òÖ 17:45 - 18:15 Intellectual Property Rights 101 / Sil Hu

Sil will give a 30-45 minute presentation on IP rights in regard of technical inventions, i.e. patent and copy rights and trade secrets. After this you will know what intellectual property rights are and what their function is in society. You will know what the scope of the IP rights are and their limitations. You will have a general understanding of the requirements that need to be satisfied to claim protection and you will be able to identify the differences of each IP right.

‚òÖ 18:30 - 19:00 Open Energy Hub / OEHU team

This month you can learn about OEHU (a new energy project using the decentralized web).

OEHU makes y√≥u owner of your energy data. Simple connect OEHU to your smart meter & immediately get access to your personal dashboard. Read about the OEHU project at https://oehu.org/.

In this session the OEHU shows how you can use OEHU for your advantage. Also there will be an Q&A.

‚òÖ 19:00 - 19:30 Blockbar / What happened in Blockchain this month?

Join us for an interactive session on the developments in blockchain / crypto space last month. Everyone can bring its list with news, developments, updates on new projects of this month. End result is "The state of blockchain, October 2018". Join if you like to know more about blockchain developments in general.

üçª DRINKS

19:30 Get to know the people even more, start new projects together, drink on failures and successes.

There will be some food available. We ask for an optional donation that can be paid at the event.

Drinks & food can be payed in both crypto, cash & e-EUR.

--

Vierde vrijdag group chat on Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/A8b03hGYC8RkLnEa4_tGeA
results.how_to_find_us: Find "The Hague Tech" on Maps, ring the bell for "Blockbar" and go to the 3rd floor. Then left.
results.name: Vierde vrijdag! #Tech, business, networking, talks #energydata #law #blockchain

results.description:
An evening dedicated to business & tech: Vierde vrijdag is the monthly meetup where people share knowledge and experience using talks & workshops c.q. a good place to meet&learn.

Every fourth Friday of the month. Tell something about your month, growth, fuckups, best new connections, the book you read recently, insights..

‚òÖ 16:30 Walk-in & drinks
It's Friday! From 4.30pm we have some starter drinks, together with the borrel to celebrate a new partnership of THBA, IQ, World Startup Factory and Find Brasil (The Hague/NL - Brasil).

‚òÖ 17:00 Welcome & 2 minute announcements (all)
Have something to share, ask or announce to the community? Do it now! You have two minutes to share what you want to share.

The meetup has four time slots:
17:15 - 18:00
18:15 - 19:00
19:15 - 19:45
19:45 - 20:15
Find your talk and feel free to switch in between in case of parallel sessions. Food is available during the full evening.

‚òÖ 17:15 Blockchain technology for your business /Susanne Pieterse (beginner)
The presentation will give insight into blockchain applications for business processes. You will learn under which circumstances blockchain technology can innovate your business. | EVENT SPACE

‚òÖ 18:15 Intellectual Property 101 /Sil Hu (beginner)
Intellectual Property 101 re technical inventions, part 2. While the first session of October 26 focused on copy rights and trade secrets, we will now look at patents and their relation to other IPRs. What is it and what is it not? What does it take to register patents in Europe? To patent or not to patent?; that is (also) the question. | EVENT SPACE

‚òÖ 18:15 The Blockchain Tiramisu - Tech Stacks and Pragmatic Engineering /Liam Zebedee (tech/expert)
Deep dive into blockchain engineering practices, where they stem from, and all different aspects of the stack that you wouldn‚Äôt consider at first glance üòõ | LAB SPACE

‚òÖ 19:15 The Hague: Vision on a digital city /Yvo (beginner)
Ivo Hunink works with the The Hague municipality on an interesting project: Vision on a digital city and municipality - Join to hear about the current results of the project & share some ideas! | LAB SPACE

‚òÖ 19:45 Blockchain Monthly Update (intermediate)
Join us for an interactive session on the developments in blockchain & crypto space last month. Everyone can bring its list with news, developments, updates on new projects of this month. End result is "The state of blockchain, November 2018". Join if you like to know more about blockchain developments in general. | LAB SPACE

üçª Drinks
Drinks & diner can be payed in both crypto, cash & e-EUR. 1.00 per drink, 5 euros for food. | MAIN SPACE

The program is not final yet. Do you want to be a part of the program by facilitating a session? => https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOMPfYigJbng2kiBVJn5eEBb4WN2WgcIIxUVP3SBXStrWwIw/viewform

WHAT TO EXPECT
=================

This Vierde vrijdag takes place at The Hague Tech, the tech hub just behind The Hague Central Station.

During the day you are welcome to work and meet at The Hague Tech. From 10am The Hague Tech is open. The https://www.meetup.com/blockbar meetup is there as well during daytime.

At 17:00 we start with presentations.

HOW TO GET THERE
===================

You can reach The Hague Tech easily by bike, train, metro, bus, and tram. (If you are by car, there is paid street parking in the area till 14:00.)

For a walking route from Central Station to The Hague Tech, see the last slider image of this page. Or watch this video for an alternative route: https://youtu.be/YeeMzcAUNk8

--

Vierde vrijdag is a collaboration of the communities of The Hague Tech (https://www.thehaguetech.com/events), Blockbar (https://www.blockbar.nl/), AI Lab (https://www.meetup.com/AI-Lab/) among others.

You're invited to join Vierde vrijdag group chat on Telegram:
https://t.me/joinchat/A8b03hGYC8RkLnEa4_tGeA

meta.description: Access Meetup events using a group, member, or event id. Events in private groups are available only to authenticated members of those groups. To search events by topic or location, see [Open Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/open_events).
